name: Hot Swap: Cyberlust
description:
Time for the Hot Swap series - back with one of the sexiest themes ever to satisfy all your cyber needs! Swap and rotate square blocks in the correct order to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls! Earn all the stars to beat record scores and unlock achievements.
Now with the Skip Level feature!
Use your puzzle skills to swap and rotate blocks in the correct order
15 challenging levels
Uncensored content
Beat the record times to earn stars
Realistic graphics
Atmospheric music
30 achievements
Display girls from the gallery
Easily skip levels - unlock girls if you can't beat a level for more than 10 mins
